name: offirmo-monorepo
description: A monorepo for all my JavaScript / TypeScript personal projects. So convenient!
author: Offirmo <offirmo.net@gmail.com>

scripts.heroku-prebuild: echo This runs before Heroku nodjs buildback installs dependencies. Ensuring monorepo setup... && pwd && test -f Procfile && yarn global add bolt
scripts.heroku-postbuild: echo This runs after Heroku installs dependencies, but before Heroku prunes and caches dependencies. && pwd && ls -l && bolt

comments.01: Netlify build only installs PROD dependencies, so make sure modules critical for scripts are included!
